name: Balcony Police
description:
Feel the experience of the COVID lockdown on Europe. Turn yourself on a vigilante and throw toilet paper to the people walking on the street.  Now your watch begins, and nobody will skip the quarantine!

This is a small prototype done within a few hours on a weeked, just for fun.  It has been tested only on HTC Vive. Please comment if you have tried it on another headset.
